articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Apple confirms it pulled controversial dating apps Tea and TeaOnHer from the App Store - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple has pulled the controversial dating safety apps Tea and TeaOnHer from the App Store over violations of its content moderation and privacy rules, following a flood of user complaints and reports of minors’ data being exposed.
articles.content: Controversial dating safety apps, Tea and TeaOnHer, have been pulled from the Apple App Store. The apps’ removal was first spotted by the app store intelligence provider Appfigures, which told TechCr… [+2786 chars]
